description: This Robinson family-run truck is taking good ole southern comfort cuisine (along with some good ole southern hospitality) straight to the streets of Durham, and everyone is just lovin’ it. Their menu features favorites like BBQ Pork Ribs, Jumbo Smoked Turkey Legs, and fish, chicken, and shrimp- all fried to crisp deliciousness. You’ll also find gator bites and delightfully refreshing homemade lemonade. For all this and more, get yourself to R&B; Grill & Concession for a fun and tasty experience you’re sure to adore.
name: R&B; Grill and Concession
